General.Name: Xingyuan Environment Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the environmental protection industry in China and internationally. It offers water treatment technologies for the urban water supply industry; develops municipal sewage treatment solutions; develops industrial wastewater treatment processes for the projects covering pulping and papermaking, food and yeast, textile printing and dyeing, pharmacy, chemical, metallurgy, and other fields; and sewage treatment technology systems. The company also provides products for the reuse of reclaimed water; filter products for use in chemical, metallurgy, petroleum, printing and dyeing, ceramics, food, pharmacy, building material, coal washing, mine, sewage treatment, and other industries; and integrated solutions to users on energy utilization analysis, metallurgy, chemical, light industry, food, textile printing and dyeing, etc., as well as generates electricity from waste incineration. In addition, it provides landscape architecture services in the fields of river system, lake and reservoir, garden, road, square, green belt, etc.; mining land rehabilitation services; valley harnessing services; and reservoir environment governance services. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Xingyuan Filter Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2015. Xingyuan Environment Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
